title: In Chains
description: A romance set in a world where slavery is government run and slaves are fitted with microchips. Savannah, fleeing a turbulent relationship, seeks solace at her brother’s country farmhouse. It’s there that she meets Kayden; her brother’s slave who's considered less than human. These two damaged souls form an unbreakable bond, one that’s about to be tested, because Kayden is her brother’s property and he will stop at nothing to keep them apart.Please note this book contains some sexual scenes, violence and strong language.
author: Michelle  Abbott
